conversion_verification.notes: Successful conversion to a clean 3D isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear volume, thickness, and a clean ceiling cutaway.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High layout fidelity; room proportions and adjacency match the 2D floor plan accurately.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement captures the spirit of the plan, though some decorative items vary slightly from the original symbols.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; consistent materials and lighting with no text contamination.

detected_errors.description: Minor door swing orientation variations compared to original architectural symbols.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that preserves the complex geometry and furniture layout of the original floor plan with high structural clarity.
